If Jackson wins, he’ll earn enough money to save his son. But if Backstrom wins, Max could die. How far would you go to save your child’s life?

programme.title: You Are a King: Les Brown Inspirational Speeches
programme.desc: Considered to be one of the best speakers in the world, Les Brown struggled his way to the top. He will inspire you to hustle hard, stay hungry, and always believe in the power of now.

programme.title: Top EPIC MOTIVATIONAL Speeches Vol. 1
programme.desc: Here is Goalcasts collection of the top motivational speeches to get you pumped.

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: The Rise Of Damien Rider
programme.desc: S1:E7 Damien Rider was beaten up, thrown against walls, and left all by himself as a child because of an abusive stepfather. After four attempts to end his own life, he decided he needed to deal with his demons by doing the most extreme thing he could do. Discover why Damien felt like he needed to paddle through a deadly ocean and why when he was just about to quit, the entire trajectory of his life would be permanently changed forever.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: The Rise Of Fredia Gibbs
programme.desc: S1:E6 Fredia Gibbs was the first female African American kickboxing world champion who learned how to fight as a child because she grew up scared and afraid. It wasn’t until she unknowingly got into a van alone after a party with a man who turned out to be a serial killer, that all the years of fighting and training would help her unleash the power she had inside of her and catapult her to new heights.

programme.title: Kristen Stewart vs. Robert Pattinson
programme.desc: S1:E2 Every girl wanted to be Bella Swan in the blockbuster movie, Twilight. When Kristen Stewart auditioned and got the role, she fell in love with co-star Robert Pattinson shortly after, and the world became obsessed with the new young couple. But what Kristen didn’t expect was the endless media scrutiny, paparazzi following her entire life, and the endless craze from fans. After getting caught in a shocking scandal and being villainized by the entire world. But the media got her story wrongKristen had to embrace her authenticity to have the courage to be who she truly was regardless of what the world thought. We dug into Kristen and Roberts romance to find the real life story behind the tabloids.

programme.title: The Kardashians vs. Jordyn Woods
programme.desc: S1:E4 Jordyn Woods was somebody the Kardashian family trusted. But all that changed when rumours of her being a home wrecker emerged after a scandalous yet confusing night at a party with Khloé Kardashian’s then-boyfriend and NBA player, Tristan Thompson. Our team investigated both sides of the story and got the real truth about what happened that night.

programme.title: Britney Spears vs. Justin Timberlake
programme.desc: S1:E8 Did Britney Spears really cheat on Justin Timberlake? Britney and Justin were the perfect couple until she was accused of cheating on him after their breakup. Justin told the world his side of the story and the media believed him while Britney was mocked and silenced. The whole world watched as Britney went from being the media’s pop princess to spiralling in a very public meltdown, but what did Justin have to do with it? Our team uncovered the truth behind what really happened, and what Justin’s iconic Cry Me a River video has to do with Britney’s freedom.

programme.title: Justin Bieber Vs. Hailey Bieber
programme.desc: S2:E7 Justin and Hailey Bieber are at the height of their careers. So why do they keep getting sick? Our team uncovers this isn’t the first time one of Justin’s love interests has had a life-threatening illness. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Selena Gomez with Hailey?

programme.title: Drake Vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E16 Drake went from hip hop hero to deadbeat dad when Kanye West collaborator Pusha T revealed Drake was hiding a secret son, but why was he hiding his son in the first place? And how did Pusha know about it?Everybody assumed Kanye had leaked the information because he was threatened by Drake’s success, but the truth is way more complicated.After digging into Drake and Kanye’s feud and friendship, our team discovered the real story behind Drake’s secret son and the journey he went on to embrace fatherhood for himself.

programme.title: Real Stories With Charity Witt
programme.desc: The Inspiring story of how Charity Witt - The Worlds Strongest Barbie - won The Titan Games Season 1. Just as when she thought she was losing, and her competitor had a good lead on her, Charitys winner mindset kept her pushing to become the winner of Titan Games Season 1. Filmed at Strict Vision Athletics in Gilbert, AZ.

programme.title: Root Financial: How to invest during periods of inflation

programme.title: The Greeks Episode 2
programme.desc: the Greeks Crash Course, we turn our attention to Vega. Often considered a third wheel relative to Delta and Theta, Vega doesnt command the attention that our first two Greeks command. Still, since volatility is such an important part of the entire tastytrade process, understanding the intuition behind Vega is critically important as an active trader.

programme.title: Episode 15 Building Blocks of Portfolio Management _ Options Crash Course
programme.desc: As we round out tastytrades Options Crash Course, today, we take a look at portfolio theta. While theta at the position level measures the decay for that one, single trade, theta at the portfolio level measures the collective decay for all positions. So today we establish some foundational targets for portfolio theta, while remembering that too much theta can be a bad thing.

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.title: PRISMA
programme.desc: Prisma es un programa cultural producido por CGTN en español en colaboración con el multimedio de comunicación latinoamericano teleSUR. Su objetivo es mostrar a los televidentes la riqueza cultural de China y el mundo hispanohablante, elevar el conocimiento de la cultura china en los países de habla hispana y establecer una plataforma de diálogo entre ambas partes. Se trata de un programa mensual de 30 minutos de duración que comenzó a emitirse en agosto de 2016. Está compuesto de tres segmentos que destacan por su diversidad temática. Primero, un espacio de noticias culturales; después, una semblanza de alguna personalidad del ámbito cultural latinoamericano; y finalmente un documental sobre aspectos de la cultura china.

Far Out Ones
programme.desc: Join the all-star cast of Teton Gravity Research's award-winning 2018 film "Far Out" as they travel the world in search of deep powder, steep lines, and gnarly terrain to shred on their skis and snowboards

programme.title: Kayaking Québec City
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks along the Jacques Cartier River before heading to Québec City to explore the cobblestone streets and old buildings the UNESCO World Heritage Site is known for.

programme.title: Otterbody
programme.desc: Join Jeremy Jones and the TGR team as they attempt to ride the Otterbody, a 55-degree patch of snow perched on the Grand Teton, while filming for Higher, TGR's 2014 snowboard film.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking the Saguenay Fjord
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he heads to Saguenay-Lac-Saint-Jean, home of the Saguenay–St. Lawrence Marine Park and the Parc national du Fjord-du-Saguenay—and one of the most dramatic landscapes in North America. Explore all that the amazing region has to offer as Ken sea kayaks alongside towering cliffs, sails through the heart of the fjord and whitewater kayaks down the world-class rivers Québec is known for.

programme.title: Kayaking the 'Canadian Amazon'
programme.desc: Big Creek in Southern Ontario's Norfolk County is commonly referred to as ‘the Canadian Amazon’ as it winds its way through thick forest, while presenting paddlers with a natural obstacle course of fallen trees. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he explores this ecological wonder from the seat of his kayak.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking Killarney
programme.desc: With stunning, coastal paddling and epic lake tripping, Killarney Provincial Park has something for kayakers and canoeists alike. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks a unique stretch of coastline known as Baie Fine – a freshwater fjord in the heart of Georgian Bay.

programme.title: Kayaking Québec City
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks along the Jacques Cartier River before heading to Québec City to explore the cobblestone streets and old buildings the UNESCO World Heritage Site is known for.

programme.title: TGR Tested Crested Butte
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew in Crested Butte, Colorado as they test and review several of the newest and most exciting mountain bikes on the market, focusing on technology and performance.

programme.title: Pathfinder
programme.desc: Life Beyond Fear. Pathfinder is a tale about the human spirit.The film follows six world-class slackliners (Highliners) on a mission deep into the Norwegian mountains to attempt something that’s never been seen before: Walking a thin line, elevated in the vastness between two colossal cliffs, illuminated only by the mystical northern lights.

programme.title: Norseman: A Day Of Extremes
programme.desc: Follow Caroline’s preparation and Norseman experience during 2022. This film follows her to Nepal where amongst the breathtaking scenery of the Himalayas she suffers with a medical emergency and is forced to return home. A few weeks later she competes in her home extreme triathlon. Celtman is held in the Highlands of Scotland where the weather and terrain mimic a little of what Norseman will hold. But can Caroline ever feel truly ready to take on the world’s toughest triathlon?

programme.title: Whitewater Canoeing the Madawaska River - Part 1
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he hops in a whitewater solo canoe for the first time ever and attempts to put his whitewater paddling skills to the test on the Madawaska River.

programme.title: Fred Is Gone Crazy
programme.desc: The scene opens with some strange noises in the background. A voiceover announces that it is front page news. One of the characters seems concerned and confused by this announcement. Another character dismisses them and decides to update their superior on their progress. The lazy characters are given a ten-minute break, during which chaos ensues. One of the characters complains of a conspiracy, while another calls for a red alert. A character named Fred is said to have gone crazy, and everyone is encouraged to run for their lives. The chaos settles down eventually, and one character expresses frustration at being made a fool of. However, their commander reassures them and promises to clear their name. The scene ends with a newspaper article about a big brute who was transformed into a sweety by a little girls love.

However, driven by their desire to return to their home planet, the Buster Gang threatens Shines safety. Will Thunder be able to fulfill his promise and prove himself as a dependable bodyguard? Only time will tell.

programme.title: COLLAPSE
programme.desc: When the world is suddenly filled with the undead, Robert Morgans (Chris Mulkey) worries are pulled away from how to keep the family farm how to keep his family alive. Robert must defend their home from the invaders with his wife Molly (Karen Landry) near the breaking point and his son bitten by one of the creatures. But as supplies run low and he is forced to venture out for food, Robert encounters more danger and must become even more brutal in his attempts to provide for his family. When other survivors appear, will they be able to help him, or will they turn out to be the greatest threat to his family? With outstanding performances by the cast and makeup and effects from an award-winning team, Collapse offers a new twist on the zombie

programme.title: BLISSFUL LIES
programme.desc: Is about the close bond between 5 lifelong friends who are now of college age, who find the limits of their relationships are tested when secrets and lies begin to arise. There are multiple secrets between members which ultimately leave them all wondering if it is too much to move forward as the family they once were. In addition there is a forbidden love between two unlikely people. They have shared a close bond with one another since childhood. We see the bonds emerge as the characters develop and we as the audience can relate to how they feel about one another. In this dramatic film things are often not what they seem and although were able to connect with the characters in various ways, their actions are shocking.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 19
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Risas y Más
programme.desc: Bienvenidos a Risas y más, el programa donde contamos los videos más divertidos de todos los tiempos.

programme.title: I Lee
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: BeAFriend
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Yes You Can - Pancake
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: FIRE AWAY!
programme.desc: On a chilly morning, Xia tries to heat things up with his Golden Katana, but keeps accidentally setting fires. He does no better as the Dragon Warrior. When Negu sends a mutant Heat Monster, the Guardians will have to fight fire with fire…or possibly water.

programme.title: Fly me to the Moon.
programme.desc: When Gummy admires how pretty the moon is up in the sky, he decides he wants to go there, and sets out to try and do just that in some pretty strange ways!

programme.title: Sundar Bana Hulk
programme.desc: A customer who is a doctor comes to the caf carrying a box filled with test tubes. He accidentally leaves a test tube behind by which Sundar happens to drink it. Sundar now starts having episodes where he turns into a muscular, scary version of himself for a brief while (like Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde). He bullies Chair Raja and Basha during these episodes but then the potion starts to wear off. Sundar continues to fake it but finally has to bear the brunt of his bullying.

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: CHAPPAR PHAD KE!
programme.desc: Customers are complaining about the taste of the tea. Chai raja cant concentrate in preparation as the Radio is going on and off due to weak signal. Chai Raja orders Sundar to climb the roof of the tea stall and hold the radio for better signal. This is the golden opportunity for Basha, with Sundar on the roof; there is no one to guard the tea. That is not it. Basha tries everything possible to make the radio signals go crazy thereby making Chai Raja go crazier and Sundar running for his dear life!

programme.title: Spooktacular.
programme.desc: The gang is ‘haunted’ by a mystery spook – and sets out to overcome their collective fear and get to the bottom of the scary mystery.

programme.title: Catch the Wave
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Atchoo!
programme.desc: The Guardians meet a very cute mutant with a terrible cold. They decide to adopt it and name it Atchoo. When the Guardians see that the gates of the Magic Fort standing open, they think Atchoo has betrayed them. But in fact, Atchoo has been captured by Amkko and Koto, who wanted to get Negu’s defective mutant back again. The Guardians free their friend and discover that the only ones at the Magic Fort were the Wise Elders, doing a spot of cleaning.

programme.title: Jack and the Beanstalk
programme.desc: A kind boy GoGo finds a bean seed and grows it, which sprouts all the way into the clouds. GoGo climbs the plant and finds the Giants castle above the clouds.

programme.title: CHAI-CE CREAM
programme.desc: It is a hot summer day and the customers are sweating. Chai Raja and Sundar are trying hard to keep them cool. To make matters worse a group of school students come with their class teacher as a part of their picnic. And the same time an ice-cream seller comes in front of the shop. Delighted, all the customers and the students flock around him to buy ice-cream. Chai Raja and Sundar are instantly out of customers and business. Totally frustrated, Chai Raja appoints Sundar to canvas the customers back to the hotel. Sundar tries to do some stupid performances to lure the kids back. But things take a twist when Basha teams up with the ice-cream seller. Now it is full on competition. And lets see who wins!

programme.title: Trash Planet
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Marco's Garden
programme.desc: The neighboring dog Moti is very fussy about his Garden of the house and takes his job seriously to guard it.

programme.title: LOVE IS BLIND
programme.desc: Fulfilling the Elders’ assignment to wrangle clouds, Pai falls in love with a rodent girl named Lol. But Lol proves to be one of Negu’s mutants, intent on stealing the Glove of the North.

programme.title: NewPointofView
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Day At The Museum
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want a pleasant day at the museum. But there are three surprise visitors – the trio. And as they enter, the museum runs haywire. The mummies come to life, the swords fly around and Don is running for his life. How will this all end???

programme.title: Library Trouble
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are in the library. And the library has rules – of silence and composure. But with the rats trying their level best to irritate don, the library is as noisy and dirty as a market place in no time!!

programme.title: Kites Away!
programme.desc: It all happens for a kite! Don wants it… the rats wont let it go. And in this tug of war, an angry and frustrated King Chomp is funnily pulled into. It is a bad time for the rats and a very bad time for Don and Colonel.

programme.title: Mango Season
programme.desc: It’s the mango season and Dunky has to guard all the mangoes so that no one will steal them. He has taken the help of Cat and Keet to guard them from Hoodie and the mean cat gang.

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: Runaway Custard
programme.desc: Tiggy is busy making custard and Deedee and Nino are helping out. But Mayor De Pfeffle cannot seem to understand what happened to his purple custard freshly sent over by Nino. So Mewmew offers to help while taking eggs over to Tiggy’s. But the carton turns out to only have one egg, and Tiggy needs to make eight more jars of purple custard. The answer seems to lie in Deedee’s magic spell that makes one purple custard jar never run out of purple custard for the entire day. And it works like a charm, non-stop purple custard. The Mayor gets a half eaten jar of purple custard and keeps it safe for after, only to have it finished by the Doobydoos. As the Mayor turns up at Tiggy’s once more for more purple custard, he rushes off with the jar that the spell has been cast on. A happy Mayor gets Mewmew to stay guard of the jar while he is out, and Mewmew catches the Doobydoos red handed trying to eat the custard. But the jar tips over in the confusion and unknown to Mewmew the loyal custard guard, the bottle keeps on flowing till it reaches the ground floor. Deedee is called in urgency and only Nino can fly up the building and put the jar right up again. Having done that they call all the townsfolk to come to town hall to eat up as much purple custard as they can. All join in and have a hearty treat, so much so that they cannot have a bite more. Finally Mayor De Pfeffle arrives and is happy to share his purple custard with everyone, but much to his surprise no one wants any. Wonder why?

programme.title: Love in the World
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: WATER WATER
programme.desc: It is a fine morning with customers pouring in. But Chai Raja realizes that he has run out of water for making tea. And he calls Sundar to fill the bucket with water. What follows is an absolutely crazy line of madness when poor Sundar tries to fill his bucket with water and a naughty naughtynaughtyBasha snatches away all the snacks in the teashop and also makes Sundars water fetching chore a literal nightmare. It ends up with the entire teashop drowning in water. And an excited Sundar swimming triumphantly towards his master with a bucket of water. OfcourseSundar gets a clean trashing!!!

programme.title: Kramazon
programme.desc: Buzz watches Miss Paige order supplies before her vacation online and have it show up the next day. Buzz tells the others and the Creepy Candy hatch a plan to go shopping while Paige is away! Watch the chaos unfold in this hilarious episode when their order is delivered and the party begins!

programme.title: A Fishy Chase
programme.desc: Something is fishy in the air! Its Don’s new pet, a Goldfish. Charly Marly and Lary are drooling in hopes of feasting it, but not till Don is there to rescue it.

programme.title: Smighty Frighty
programme.desc: In this Halloween-themed story, Sneevil and Biggs get the scare of the lifetime when the Spooky Smighties decide to teach them a lesson in the middle of Fright Forest.

programme.title: The Date
programme.desc: A date that turned into a nightmare, thanks to the rat trio. With a spring in his step, all Doggy Don wanted was a romantic and quiet date with his girlfriend. After being drenched in Chili Sauce, bathed in cement, and brushing with Dynamite, Its surprising that there was any bit of him left for the date. But Alas the trios are the rightful owners of the last laugh!

programme.title: Comet Run
programme.desc: X begins acting strangely, creating tension with Speed and the others. When X leaves to join the Shadowy Organization, Speed decides to infiltrate the Shadowy Org to save him. Speed soon discovers that X is working undercover. When Xs cover is blown, he and Speed must try and escape the Shadowy Organization HQ with the missing Part.

programme.title: Egg Carton
programme.desc: Hepi and Briko using their smarts make the best use of an old egg carton

programme.title: Old Jeans
programme.desc: Wondering what to do with that old pair? Hepi and Briko have an excellent idea

programme.title: Prickly Pair
programme.desc: Nino is having a tough time trying to put his daisies up as desired to win the Wonderful Window Box competition that Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting. Deedee cheers him up by saying that flowers can be placed anywhere as long as it makes Abra-Dabra more beautiful. Just then Mewmew runs in all flustered and panicky. The problem seems to be that the creeper plant at Mewmew’s window hasn’t grown big enough to creep all around the heart-shaped support. But Deedee can’t help with magic, as it would be unfair in the competition against everyone else. Charlie loves his display but is being overprotective by shooing the twins away to play ball elsewhere. The twins accidentally throw the ball directly at Uncle Charlie’s display, knocking them all down and breaking them in the process. But there’s no time to fix them up without magic. Deedee brews a magic potion with a few ingredients. The magic potion makes all of Charlie’s flowers into cacti, something Charlie dislikes the most. Since Deedee feels she’s let Charlie down, they all decide to take theor very own flowers to replace Charlie’s exhibit. But with a sudden spelt of rain, all are damaged by the time they reach Charlie’s. But the rain has also caused the cacti to bloom, a rare sight indeed. Mayor De Pfeffle awards Uncle Charlie with the honour of being winner of the Wonderful Window Boz contest. But Charlie wants to share the award with all his friends

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: A Fog of A Different Color
programme.desc: When the Foggy messes with the Zoonicorns colors, Maple learns that the appearance of a thing does not define what it is. It’s not what’s on the outside that makes a thing/person what it is, but what’s on the inside

programme.title: Polka dots
programme.desc: YoHe wants to be like YoShe. Together with his sister he jumps into a world in which everyone and everything is a copy of a copy and he learns how much important it is to be different

programme.title: THAT SINKING FEELING
programme.desc: Mei decides to impress Negu with an art museum. He has the Rock-Eating Mutant pull down old buildings to build the museum. The Guardians’ “island” starts to sink. Pai “fishes” for the cause of the sinking and pulls up the Mutant, whom they entice to eat something besides rocks.

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: No rain, no gain
programme.desc: The twins meet Imelda, a very anxious lizard. Because she can see a small cloud in the blue sky, Imelda is preparing to face a hurricane. Perhaps you can think positive and consider that a bit of rain is good for someone else.

programme.title: A Cola Fix !!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are into a new business – COLONEL COLA!!! But there are three unwanted partners – of course the rats! With them running loose in the factory, the dogs have a hard time keeping themselves alive, let alone the business stand. Business turns into a busy mess.

programme.title: A Sweet Rush
programme.desc: What began as a tug of war for a six layered cake culminated in Don fixing a security alarm to the kitchen door that stopped anyone from stepping in, even Don himself. Lary Marly and Charly have found a way to dance themselves to the fridge escaping the floor sensors.

programme.title: STICKY SITUATION
programme.desc: Having used his Mystic Stick to defeat a giant beaver, Pai loves his weapon more than ever. Spying, Negu gets an idea. The Guardians’ and the Elders’ possessions start to go missing, and they keep being tricked. A mysterious expert declares the culprit to be…Pai’s stick! But just as Xia’s about to burn the stick, it turns into a mutant Stick Insect sent by Negu! The Guardians battle the mutant and defeat it using Pai’s beloved stick.

programme.title: Two Tickets.
programme.desc: When Gummy wins two tickets to a big dance show, each of his best pals vie to be the one he gives the coveted second ticket to.

programme.title: SCHOOL’S OUT!
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to play Bingo, Pai and Xia say it’s party time! They get April to dance, but she loses her fan, which falls down to the Chou World. Amkko and Koto use it to fly up to the Yan World on the giant mutant chicken. While April distracts the mutants with tango lessons, Xia and Pai send the chicken packing.

programme.title: JOY RIDE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to clean the Lord of the Wind. They can’t resist riding the annual Surf Winds, but Xia and April end up captured by the Wind Beast. Pai rescues them by repulsing the sensitive Wind Beast with his onion and sulfur-geyser stink.

programme.title: The Fast Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: The Gigantic Turnip
programme.desc: A gigantic turnip grows in the fields of the peasant GoGo grandpa. He tries to pull out an enormous, heavy turnip with the help of grandma, cats, and mice.

programme.title: Plastic Bottle
programme.desc: Watch Hepi an Briko transform plastic bottles to something out of this world. Literally.

programme.title: BABY DRAGON
programme.desc: Xia tries to master his transformation into the Dragon Warrior. Negu sends a Mutant Dragon, who decides Xia would be a perfect baby for her. April and Pai get the Mutant Dragon to fall in love with their dragon-shaped ship, the Lord of the Wind.

programme.title: Paperclip
programme.desc: Nothing is too boring for Hepi and Briko, see them make fun things with paper clips

programme.title: Brother Sun and Sister Moon
programme.desc: Late night, GoGo and I-Go wait for their mother who’s at the market selling rice cakes. Meanwhile, her mother gets eaten by a tiger whom disguises as her mother and makes his way to the siblings.

programme.title: A Smelly Taco Surprise
programme.desc: Nardy makes a Taco Surprise which gives Zap a bad case of smelly gas. Will the embarrassed Smighty help when Sneevil rides into Smightyland in his gigantic Bowling Boulder Ball?

programme.title: 52 The Zoonigames
programme.desc: Pancake is disheartened when Odessa beats him at a game, but after playing a series of games in the Zooniverse, he learns there’s something even more important than winning-or-losing. Playing games is not about winning or losing but bout having fun!

programme.title: Electric Chase
programme.desc: They are so fed up of the rats that colonel comes up with an idea to tame them – an electronic super cat! And it works! The rats are terrified of it. Now it is the rule of the dogs. Until..until the idea backfires. Watch it for a hilarious time.

programme.title: The Magic Lamp
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old magic lamp – complete with a genie popping out when he chances to rub it. The three pals suddenly have three wishes .

programme.title: A Packet of Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy, Kala and Harry get caught up in an escalating competition to get the whole collection of cereal box ‘free surprises’ – with each of them only missing the super-rare little plastic unicorn.

programme.title: Mom-Bot
programme.desc: When Fred’s parents leave him home alone, he tries to throw the coolest party in history—until Principal Darling checks up on him. Friday replicates Fred’s mom, and Mombot puts the Principal at ease, before short-circuiting, and making the party extremely uncool.

programme.title: Captain Blackbeard – Little Mermaid Case 2
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of “The Little Mermaid” by Hans Christian Andersen, having been called out by a Turtle-Doctor, who is attending to NEPTUNE, the king of the seas. The LITTLE MERMAID, the monarch’s youngest daughter, has mysteriously disappeared. NEPTUNE is very sad and his health is in danger. SANDRA and FO will carry out an in-depth investigation, discovering that everything forms part of a plan by the SEA WITCH. The evil villain of the ocean depths has summoned up the perfidious monsters of the sea, in order to gain power over all the oceans.

programme.title: Ghost Mansion
programme.desc: Keet and Cat’s chase ends up in a haunted house…with a crazy ghost living in it. The ghost loves Keet and wants to have her as a pet for himself.

programme.title: More than a Mouthful
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Library Trouble
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are in the library. And the library has rules – of silence and composure. But with the rats trying their level best to irritate don, the library is as noisy and dirty as a market place in no time!!

programme.title: Braianna-Bot
programme.desc: When Friday transforms into Braianna to cover for her absence at school, it gives her a chance to observe how people react to her.

programme.title: Fred Gets Crushed
programme.desc: Fred thinks Brains is acting strangely, and decides it’s because she has a secret crush on his best friend Sir Percival. Fred secretly spies on them to learn their secret, only to embarrass himself in the process.

programme.title: Spooktacular.
programme.desc: The gang is ‘haunted’ by a mystery spook – and sets out to overcome their collective fear and get to the bottom of the scary mystery.

programme.title: The Mystery
programme.desc: Kala’s martial arts trophy has vanished – and ‘detective’ Gummy volunteers his services to unravel the mystery and track down the culprit.

programme.title: Friday Gets Recalled
programme.desc: Brains is informed that Friday is being recalled, and replaced by a superior shape-shifting robot weapon. Fred convinces Brains to help retrieve Friday from a futuristic junk yard, because Friday is also a friend. Meanwhile the new robot tries to hunt them down and stop them.

programme.title: Three's A Pain
programme.desc: When Pancake, Odessa, and Maple end up getting into a tiff over some colored chalk they’re using to draw pictures with, they ALL wind up in the Zooniverse at the same time that night! Sharing is caring. / Teamwork is the way.

programme.title: Shy Tommy Prickles
programme.desc: Mewmew is all set for her party but didn’t have sufficient time to handout the invitations. Deedee and Nino agree to help. They soon invite all of Abra-Dabra, but Tommy Prickles isn’t so keen on attending, because he feels so very shy. But as Deedee doesn’t have any spell to make Tommy’s shyness go away she improvises without magic by making Tommy believe that she has cast a spell on Tommy’s hat. Tommy agrees to attend the party in the guise that the hat he is wearing is now a chatter hat that will help him talk to others at the party. Nino is confused as he’s happy on one side that magic wasn’t used but sad that Tommy thinks magic is used. Tommy Prickles fits right in at the party and has fun playing with the Doobydoos and talks so freely and happily with everyone. Just then a huge gust of wind ruffles everything including Tommy’s hat. Poor sad Tommy feels so shy and helpless that he wants to go back home. But Deedee implores him to stay by trying to make him hopeful that Nino would return soon with Tommy’s hat. Tommy slumps on the ground and won’t budge, not until Deedee gets Tommy to don Tiggy’s baker hat. Tommy jumps springs back up and rounds all the party goers to teach them his very own special Wiggly Worm dance. Just then as they all dance in a bee-line behind Tommy, Nino flies in with Tommy’s hat. A confused Tommy discovers that he was wearing Tiggy’s hat till then and is flabbergasted to know that Deedee didn’t work any magic into the hat all along. Tommy Prickles runs away crying. Tommy reasons with Deedee that all of Abra-Dabra will think of him as silly, but Deedee tells him that if he couldn’t believe her, then to at least believe those who love having him along. Tommy looks up to see all his friends walking up to him doing the Wiggly Worm dance. Tommy takes a brave step and listens to his friends wanting have him back. He joins them just the way he is, without his ‘magic’ hat. Deedee finally agrees with Nino that sometimes no magic is good.

programme.title: Kidnap Mayhem
programme.desc: One night a group of Bandits come to GrandPAs house to kidnap him. In a scheme of confusions the bandits manage the kidnap and arrive at a lonely warehouse on the outskirts of the town.

programme.title: Merry Go Bush
programme.desc: Pancake isn’t taking care of his new pet fish appropriately, even though he’s trying super-hard. When he arrives in the Zoonivese and tries to help Ene take care of a Merry-Go-Bush, he learns to that there’s a right way, and a wrong way, to care for something (by following the rules), no matter the good intentions

programme.title: Mission Keet
programme.desc: Cat is frustrated that he can’t catch Keet. As he is shuffling through channels he sees ad on TV of the ‘Super Ace Parrot Catchers’ A quick call gets a snobbish Black suited cat with a briefcase Knocking on the door.

programme.title: See The Problem
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Perfect Scoop
programme.desc: Biggs tampers with Nardys newest invention, an ice cream making robot. Will Nardy be able to stop him before all of Smightyland is covered in frozen treats?

programme.title: Bicycle Chase
programme.desc: It’s a lovely day . Dunky is busy oiling his old cycle - until Cat comes around snatches the cycle , removes its wheels and rolls it to the top of the house chasing Keet even on the electric cables.

programme.title: Basket Bunny
programme.desc: Fred bargains with the girls basketball team to let Brains join the team. In return, he agrees to be team’s bunny mascot, commanding Friday into a pair of super-jumping shoes. His get up proves handy when Brains needs his help capturing a massive space chicken.

programme.title: Instinto paterno
programme.desc: La esposa embarazada de Andréi sufre un accidente, los médicos logran salvar a su bebé, pero la madre muere.

programme.title: Instinto paterno
programme.desc: La esposa embarazada de Andréi sufre un accidente, los médicos logran salvar a su bebé, pero la madre muere.

programme.title: Mal de amores
programme.desc: María tiene claro lo que quiere: convertirse en doctora y casarse. ¿Será esto tan imposible de conseguir?

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

And they are also blessed with an uncanny ability to appear to sleep every time Popeye comes to check on them

Enlisting benevolent beings found inside Ivy's body, the crew prepares for an inner space battle that can decide the fate of the world.

programme.title: Suddenly It's Spring 1944

programme.title: Noah's Ark 1959
programme.desc: Noah gets the word: build an ark in seven days. His sons cut the necessary trees in three days, and much furious sawing and hammering follows. But there's no rest, as they need to round up all the animals. Noah boards the animals, then his sons, their wives, and his wife (who packed a ferocious picnic). The rains and flood begin. The animals soon develop cabin fever and get restless, but Mrs. Noah has the answer: "Music has charms to soothe the savage beast." His sons find instruments and begin playing; everyone dances. But Harry the hippo dances with everyone but his wife; Noah goes to her, and while she tells him not to mention Harry's name, Noah convinces her that Harry is thinking only of her. The rains end; Noah sends a dove out who brings back an olive branch. They land on Mount Ararat and disembark.

programme.title: Lonely Wives-1931
